Name: Lamp Decorated with a Portrait of a Woman
Description: The lamp has a solid handle and two openings for oil. Between them, it is decorated with the bust of a woman facing to the left. Her hair is knotted in back. She is surrounded by two circular ridges. Circles with flowers inside them decorate the sides. A tube is located between the middle of the lamp and the wick opening. The upper part of the oil opening is lost.
